derivation: neuter of a compound of G1497 (εἰδωλόθυτον) and a presumed derivative of G2380 (εἰδωλόθυτον);
kjv_def: (meat, thing that is) offered (in sacrifice, sacrificed) to (unto) idols
strongs_def: an image-sacrifice, i.e. part of an idolatrous offering
outline:
1. sacrificed to idols, the flesh left over from the heathen sacrifices
    1. it was either eaten at the feasts or sold (by the poor and the miserly) in the market
